products.name: Nike Air Max 270
products.shortDescription: Comfortable running shoes with Max Air cushioning
products.description: The Nike Air Max 270 delivers visible cushioning under every step. The design draws inspiration from Air Max icons, showcasing Nike's greatest innovation with its large window and fresh array of colors.

products.name: Adidas Ultraboost 22
products.shortDescription: Premium running shoes with Boost technology
products.description: The Adidas Ultraboost 22 features our most responsive Boost midsole yet. The Primeknit+ upper adapts to your foot for a sock-like fit.

products.name: Nike Air Force 1
products.description: The radiance lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 '07, the basketball original that puts a fresh spin on what you know best.

products.name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star
products.description: The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star is the most iconic sneaker in the world, loved by everyone from rock stars to rebels.

products.name: Vans Old Skool
products.description: The Vans Old Skool is the first Vans shoe to feature the iconic side stripe, making it a timeless classic.
